title: Sating The Wolf
alternative_title: Fill With Me; Llenate de mi; Sating the Wolf; 僕で満たして; Boku de Mitashite
status: Fill With Me; Llenate de mi; Sating the Wolf; 僕で満たして; Boku de Mitashite
description:
Description :
        "A rabbit is mounting me...?!"Busybody rabbit (alpha) x lone tsundere wolf (omega)Beastmen x Cross-Breed Love x Omegaverse!Noah, a wolf with no family, was banished from his pack - the only place he ever belonged to - due to his omega nature.He arrives in a herbivorous beastmen village where he meets Henri, a rabbit who lives alone with his little brothers.Henri hides Noah because there is still prejudice against carnivores in his village.He is touched by Noah's gentle and caring nature,and gradually begins to envision a future in which they become a family.However, Noah's heat awakens Henri's alpha sexual instincts...!"Listen, let's be a real family!"+
